WRITING.TEXT:
Lowering the setting will make the screen eventually so dark that he can't see what's being displayed, it would not make him go blind.
Increasing the brightness would have a better chance at doing that - thought it wouldn't work.

WRITING.TITLE: Steam Workshop Mods Won't Download
WRITING.TEXT:
I've downloaded them in the past, but now current mods won't update, even though I can see in the workshop that there are new patches for them, and new mods won't download.
My game is up to date, as is steam, I have cloud sync enabled and have cleared my download cache.
Any ideas ?
Thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: Event box options take a second
WRITING.TEXT: Event box options, for the most part, don't allow you to click through them right away, you have to wait for them to turn from grey for a second. This is irritating especially when you're going through many in succession. Any ideas on how to change the game files so that the events are immediately clickable ? Thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: HIP mod, shattered retreat
WRITING.TEXT: Using HIP (Historical Immersion Project) mod, and there isn't an option for disabling shattered retreat - any ideas on how I can go about this ? I would have thought that it would have been an option as it's in the vanilla game. Thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: S01E09- Easteregg
WRITING.TEXT:
Hopkins, when talking about humanity, says "do you know what happened to the neanderthals ? We ate them.". Thought it was a nice throwback to his role as Lecter.

WRITING.TITLE: Technical help, is this the right place ?
WRITING.TEXT:
I have a HP X3000 wireless mouse, it keeps cutting out. The sensor on the bottom will cut out after maybe fifteen seconds, though I click the mouse and it comes back on. I changed the batteries and that has not helped. Also checked the driver software, it's up to date. Any ideas ?
Thanks a lot

The Celtic nations, bar the Bretons, are the ones that have been oppressed by the english and their union and are the ones who will be in the confederation, so it is more important what they would think rather than some country across the sea. Your argument is ridiculous.
Edit: a word.

WRITING.TITLE: Confederation
WRITING.TEXT: Confederation would be better, union brings to mind the english.
Ah, thought he was counting up until the division. Cheers.
